projects.title: DEVELOPMENT OF GRAPHITE HEAT FLUX GAUGE at National Aerospace Laboratories, Bengaluru
projects.description: Objective of the project was to develop a Heat Flux gauge which can be used in high temperature (as high as 2500K) transient heat conditions. Graphite of high thermal conductivity coated with a 60micron layer of silicon carbide was used as the sensor material of the heat flux gauge. Series of tests were conducted to test the developed gauge.
